Pre-Game Insights: England head coach Gareth Southgate was without as many as seven players for Sunday's training session as the Three Lions prepare to face Bosnia-Herzegovina in Monday's friendly.
Harry Maguire and Luke Shaw have been nursing calf and thigh problems respectively, and both men were restricted to individual training over the weekend.
Anthony Gordon was not present on the grass with his teammates, suggesting that the 23-year-old will miss out on the chance to play for his nation at his home stadium.
Harry Kane was involved in Sunday's practice session, despite struggling with a back problem in the closing stages of his debut Bayern Munich campaign.
Jude Bellingham, Phil Foden, and Kyle Walker are still on a break following the FA Cup final, as is Manchester United's Kobbie Mainoo.

The England boss called up a preliminary squad of 33 players for the prep period, which must be trimmed down to a minimum of 23 and a maximum of 26 players by June 7, when the final Euros squads must be submitted.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Manchester United duo Harry Maguire and Luke Shaw have been nursing calf and thigh problems respectively, and both men were restricted to individual training over the weekend.
Anthony Gordon was not present on the grass with his teammates, suggesting that the 23-year-old will miss out on the chance to play for his nation at his home stadium.
Jude Bellingham, Phil Foden, and Kyle Walker are still on a break following the FA Cup final, as is Manchester United's Kobbie Mainoo.
The 20-year-old Jude Bellingham became a Champions League winner at Wembley on Saturday night as Los Blancos defeated Borussia Dortmund 2-0.
